casebody.data:
JPMC SPECIALTY MORTGAGE, LLC
v.
Natalie GAYNOR et al. Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided March 29, 2017 Loida John-Nicholson, in support of the petition. Jeffrey J. Hardiman, in opposition.

The named defendant's petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court (AC 39754) is denied.

PALMER, J., did not participate in the consideration of or decision on this petition.
